phrases: Here is this month's stock list.
Also, regarding the goods that have yet to arrive by sea...
Should we inquire about them once more, just in case?
I will leave that to you.
There is a visitor at the door...!
What in the world is this?
Are you surprised to see me?
I cannot believe you rode here on an elephant...
But at any rate, why the surprise visit?
My grandmother's been giving me a hard time at home.
Sometimes you just feel like taking a trip by yourself.
You always came to visit me.
I thought I would return the favor and come to visit you instead.
This is my friend from lndia, Hakim.
He is told me about you.
Thank you for always looking after him.
I am the one who was always looking after him...
He is so exotic and handsome!
I cannot believe he is a friend of brother Will's!
If you like the elephants, I will give you one.
Besides, can those creatures be trusted?
If something that large was to go on a rampage...
Ah, no need to worry about that.
Elephants are really quite calm and docile.
It is rare for them to attack a human.
They are very clever, sacred creatures.
He is just a bit cranky.
Anyway, I plan to stay for a week.
And since I would like to keep things quiet,
please do not tell anyone else that I am here.
A member of the lndian royal family, the son of Atawari, Hakim Atawari...
Well, if it is in the newspaper, it is not much of a secret.
The Jones family is involved in trade.
It is something to do with their work, no doubt.
So then, did he come on an elephant?
Mister Hakim would like to see you in his room, sir.
I can redecorate your room this way too if you like.
You really do need to relax more.
Anyway, what did you want me for?
Since I have come all this way to England, I thought some sightseeing would be nice.
I will prepare a carriage for you.
I have not drank enough yet to be hallucinating.
Has London zoo started up sightseeing trips?
Large animals like elephants should use the tube tunnels, do not you think?
Even lndians do not often see this kind of thing.
Well, it certainly is remarkable, but...
But I cannot get used to the swaying...
All right then, as a special favor, I will show you how fast this one can go.
If we go faster, the swaying...
I understand that... can we please just...
You will feel a bit better if you throw up...
How disgraceful, for a grown man to feel ill from a simple ride.
People were never meant to ride such things.
Does that feel a bit better?
Honestly, you gave me such a scare!
You always drop in on people so unexpectedly!
Well, I will let you off the hook for today.
It is not so bad when you get used to it.
And I was able to meet Emma.
Your guest left a few minutes ago.
I will give you a ride home.
There is no need to refuse.
Oh that is right, lndian food uses many spices, does not it?
But, is not adding all those spices bad for your health?
There are many spices, but they are all good for your health.
They have come to deliver the item you ordered.
Thank you very much for your order.
I trust the name is correct?
The order form says that I should deliver this to the Jones residence.
The mistress will be home soon.
I hope you find the taste agreeable, sir.
Actually, I came here to see you.
Emma, are you and William lovers?
It would have been awkward if you were.
William is one of my most precious friends.
I do not want to betray his friendship.
I know that it is sudden, and that we have only just met.
Forgive me, I do not mean to cause you trouble...
Although I do not know you very well,
I love the way you stand.
I love the way you move, and the way you speak so gently.
Your dulcet voice is beautiful as well...
But I love your face most of all.
Do not you like your own face?
I apologize if I upset you, but...
Emma... if you do not mind, I would like to take care of you.
That is what I wanted to tell you...
At any rate, I just wanted to see you again.
You have had that gloomy look on your face all night.
By the way, I saw the newspaper.
Seems like there is a lot going on at your place.
Is not your famous guest with you today?
I will introduce you next time.
he must be out searching for a wife!
I guess there is no use for this now.
